version_description:
We've fixed a number of defects and also made some security enhancements.

We'd love to make shopping even easier for you whether you're on the bus, in store or on your sofa. You can let us know what you would like to see in future updates by sendi

We've fixed a number of defects and also made some security enhancements.

We'd love to make shopping even easier for you whether you're on the bus, in store or on your sofa. You can let us know what you would like to see in future updates by sendi

Don’t miss out. Enable notifications and we'll let you know about our events, latest offers, clearance and app improvements.

We are now hard at work integrating the my John Lewis card into Apple Wallet and we look forward to delivering that for you

We've fixed a number of minor defects and ensured our app continues to perform well when you upgrade to iOS 10.

Keep an eye out for our next major release which will allow you to add the my John Lewis card into Apple Wallet.

You can let us k

This release contains the feature that our my John Lewis members have been waiting for. You can now add your digital card to Apple Wallet and enable it to appear on your phone lock screen when you enter one of ten John Lewis shops nearest to your home!<br

We've fixed a couple of problems – one which was causing the app to crash when VoiceOver was enabled on the product view, and another which was causing problems for customers when shopping cookware ranges.
Please keep the feedback coming using the form

It's finally here! Our new release allows you to check stock availability in shops for a selection of products, including televisions, vacuum cleaners and home cinema systems.

We're starting small with this feature but over time you'll gradually b

We hope you're enjoying our latest feature which allows you to check stock availability in our shops for a selection of products. We found a minor bug with it but it's now fixed.

As always, please share any feedback you have so we can continue to

We had a couple of bugs that were causing some crashes. These are now fixed.

Shop stock availability for more products will be appearing in the app soon so keep an eye out for those.

We're always looking for ways to improve the app so please

If you're shopping for a large appliance you can now use the app to check which of our shops has the product you want on display.

Check stock availability in shops for ceiling lights, mirrors, sewing machines and suitcases.

We've also manage

Our latest update lets my John Lewis members access their rewards vouchers digitally through the app – no need to remember paper vouchers to enjoy a ‘free hot drink and cake’ when you’re next in-store.

With the update, you can also share products w
We've fixed a number of defects to ensure you can continue shopping with ease.

We've brought back "Things We Love" to inspire you with a selection of our favourite products.

Looking to replace that old sofa or bed frame? Use our app to check which of our shops has the furniture product you want on display.

You can now
We have fixed a couple of defects.
We've squashed a few bugs.
We've enhanced some of our existing features. You can now filter Things We Love by your favourite departments, and my John Lewis members can view redeemed and expired rewards

We know our customers love an offer and now you can find more of them in the app than ever before.

We've also fixed a couple of bugs to make your shopping experience even better.
For our iPhone X customers, we've fixed the issue with crashes on sign in.

You can check stock availability in shops for lots of new products, including iPads, MacBooks, Windows laptops and tablets, small appliances and nursery essentials. We've also added support for Face ID for our iPhone X customers.
Based on customer feedback, we've reintroduced our Shop Finder feature where you can find opening hours, contact details and shop locations.
We've made a few improvements to make shopping with us even better.
We've made a couple of improvements to make shopping with us even easier.
We've listened to your feedback and added an in stock only filter so you can remove out of stock items from your search results and product lists.

We’re excited to present our new John Lewis & Partners app, which includes a new look and feel as well as a number of feature enhancements.

You can now check stock availability in shops for lots of new products, including Lego, Apple Watch, b
With this release you can enjoy enhancements to image quality. We've also fixed the bug impacting audio when opening the app.
We've made some improvements to make shopping with us even better.

You can now check stock availability in our shops for most of the products in our assortment!

We've also managed to fix a few bugs to make your shopping experience even better.

We're always looking to improve the app so please share any com
We've made some improvements to make shopping with us even better.

We are constantly improving the app to make it faster and more reliable for your shopping needs - just in time for Black Friday.

Love the app? Then please leave us as review, they let us know what works!
We’ve fixed some bugs.
We've made some improvements for Christmas.
Bug fixes.

All your online orders can now be found here in the app. Thank you for your patience while we updated our systems.

Scroll down on our product pages and you'll now see recommendations based on what other customers viewed and bought.

We've added a filter that makes finding your online orders and in-store receipts easier.

We've also fixed a few bugs to make shopping with us even better.

We've added some of our favourite social content to the homepage to help give you some inspiration while shopping.
You can now edit your password within Account on the app and fixed some accessibility elements in Kitchen Drawer.
We've fixed a defect.

We have exciting news for our beauty shoppers! Using your device camera you can now try on shades of lipstick in the app using our new Virtual Lipstick Experience feature. It's available on most lipstick products so keep an eye out for the "Try Now" label

We hope you're enjoying our new Virtual Lipstick Experience* feature. You can now see the brand and name of the lipstick you are "trying on". Very useful for the all-important selfie.

We'd love to hear what you think about Virtual Lipstick Experie

We have another update to our new Virtual Lipstick Experience* feature. We've made it easier to take and share your selfie - very useful if you want a friend to help you choose the lipstick shade that suits you best.
